This GUI can be used to run compliance Tests on Slice Authorities and Aggregate Managers. The current user credentials are used for all tests. For Tests with a Slice Authority, the Slice Authority of the current user is used (shown below). For Tests with an Aggregate Manager, select the aggregate manager to be tested below. Multiple tests are available, select the ones to run below. Hover the mouse pointer over the available texts to show more info. You can also provide a test group to run, if no group is provided all tests in the test class are executed.
Detailed test reports are written in a new map (name starting with 'test-output-') in the map this GUI runs from.
